alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 03 at 2:05AM MST until February 03 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...Guadalupe Mountains of Eddy County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 11 AM MST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 2 AM to 9 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-432- 4269.
